languages.text: "Да, а перед этим много-много раз убить. И не обязательно тех, кто этого заслуживает".

traits.locale_text: "Да, а перед этим много-много раз убить. И не обязательно тех, кто этого заслуживает".

languages.text: "Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."
languages.original_text: "Да, а перед этим много-много раз убить. И не обязательно тех, кто этого заслуживает".

traits.locale_text: "Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."
"Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."
"Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."
"Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."
"Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."
"Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."

languages.text: 「そうね、でも皇帝陛下のために死ぬ前に、さらにたくさん殺してるわ。しかも、殺されて当然の相手ばかりじゃない」
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."

traits.locale_text: 「そうね、でも皇帝陛下のために死ぬ前に、さらにたくさん殺してるわ。しかも、殺されて当然の相手ばかりじゃない」

languages.text: "Hm-hm, aber nicht, bevor sie für ihn töten. Und töten. Und töten. Und nicht nur Leute, die es verdienen."
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."

traits.locale_text: "Hm-hm, aber nicht, bevor sie für ihn töten. Und töten. Und töten. Und nicht nur Leute, die es verdienen."

languages.text: « Oui, enfin, après avoir tué en Son nom et pour toutes sortes d'autres raisons. Et pas seulement des gens qui le méritent. »
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, enfin, après avoir tué en Son nom et pour toutes sortes d'autres raisons. Et pas seulement des gens qui le méritent. »

languages.text: «Ya, pero antes prefieren matar por Él, y luego seguir matando un poco más. Y no solo a quienes se lo merecen».
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."

traits.locale_text: «Ya, pero antes prefieren matar por Él, y luego seguir matando un poco más. Y no solo a quienes se lo merecen».

languages.text: “可不是嘛，不过献出生命之前，他们会先杀人，再杀更多的人。而且，他们杀的也不只有那些该死的人。”
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."

traits.locale_text: “可不是嘛，不过献出生命之前，他们会先杀人，再杀更多的人。而且，他们杀的也不只有那些该死的人。”

languages.text: "Tabii ya. O'nun adına öldürdükten sonra hızlarını alamayacaklar, kurunun yanında yaş da yanacak."
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ya. O'nun adına öldürdükten sonra hızlarını alamayacaklar, kurunun yanında yaş da yanacak."

languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, but not before they kill for Him, and then kill some more. And not just people who deserve it."
